name: Record to ValueObject - ASCII/JavaBean
short_description: Record to ValueObject is a utility to read ASCII files (fixed or CSV) that represents data, organized in rows and columns (records and fields), and populate a ValueObject with content of each record. Useful for read/import text data in a semantic way
